title: Full Sun
Description: Receives direct summer sun for six or more hours per day.

title: Bright without Direct Sun
Description: Receives no direct sunlight, but it is in a bright area.

title: Light Shade
Description: Receives between three and five hours of direct sun in the summer.

title: Partial Shade
Description: Receives two hours of direct sun each day or shaded for at least half the day.

title: Full Shade
Description: Receives less than an hour of direct sunlight each day.

title: Dense Shade
Description: Receives no direct sunlight and little indirect light seldom reaches the ground.
